storyInfo: Sora meets a strange audience member while rehearsing the play. The city of Volsinii grows more and more restless as a banquet between Families is about to be held.

attributes.content: You don't know the kind of person he is, but I understand him.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Don't you think we place too much faith in our ability to 'understand' someone? Don't you think we're all too easily blinded by the illusions born of emotion and impulse?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Salvadore... He deserves to step out of Columbia's dark alleyways.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: My sister, he is a Siracusan, and you know nothing about how he operates. You really think he could help us get rich?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: All he's gonna do is get himself burnt - and we're gonna get caught in the middle.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: He uses his fists to protect himself, and then law and order to shackle his fists. Is that not enough for you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Get your head out of the clouds already.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No, brother. Other Siracusans wear their scars and bloodstains like badges of honor.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Only he knows that blood is nothing more than blood.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So, Sora, how's my acting?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Want me to give it to you straight?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You bet I do.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Absolutely terrible! Exusiai, you've got, like, zero talent for this!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ehh? I feel like I'm pretty emotionally invested though.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just being emotionally invested doesn't make you a good actor.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But... as far as the script is concerned, you're on the right track! At least you aren't flubbing any of your lines.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How low were your expectations?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What do you think, Croissant?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Pretty darn good, if ya ask me!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Only thing is, when yer expressin' yer dissatisfaction with the brother, think ya could dial the emotions back a notch?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hmm, so try to get the point across some other way? I... can give that a try in a moment.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Woah, Croissant, since when were you an expert?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hey, don't go underestimatin' a gal who sits in on Sora's classes every week. Not like a certain two someones who come and go without a word.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hey, I'd never leave without saying anything.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Not what I meant...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But at least this proves we'll be able to find her for sure, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Damn straight we will.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Quite the unique performance.
Ehh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Excuse me, but are you...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: My name is Benthonexigios.
Oh, hello, Bensomething-or-other...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Feel free call me Ben.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Sure thing, Ben!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Um, excuse me, Mr. Ben, if there's nothing you need from us, I'm afraid I'll have to ask you to leave. We're still in the middle of rehearsal.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Of course there is. I'm currently watching the performance, am I not?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: I don't think someone who's walking around eating pizza counts as watching anything.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Am I not allowed to watch the performance while enjoying pizza?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Well, don't theaters usually have rules against that?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That's a rule imposed on people by the theater, not by the play itself.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Norms have a way of making people superficially conflate these things, and hold them with the same degree of reverence, even erecting false pedestals upon which to elevate them. True reverence, however, is much harder to find.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Would you like a bite, young lady?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You betcha!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Bleh, the texture's awful!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's the cheapest street pizza you can find, after all. That said, their sauce is actually quite respectable.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Um... so if you were watching our performance just now, what'd you think of it?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The key takeaway is that there are some differences between the methods of capturing and expressing emotions that you seem to be adept at, versus the demands of opera.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You are clearly used to standing in front of an audience. Or should I say, you're so used to it that it makes it hard for you to stand on stage as an actor.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: That is not an indictment of your abilities, but is nevertheless a trial you must overcome.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Woah, I didn't expect you to be a total pro at this.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Think about it. You are the daughter of a wealthy Columbian magnate. He, Salvadore, is a vagrant from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: He's different from all the other men you've ever met. He does not care about your status, but values you for who you are.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: He is more indolent than anyone else, yet also cleverer.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: He seems destined to become don of a famiglia, setting off on a perilous road from which there is no turning back.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Tell me, young lady, is this someone you could love?
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Someone... I could love...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No, you are terrified! The more you love him, the more he terrifies you!
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You have no chance of keeping him.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Your intuition tells you that you should escape. That he never belonged to you.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You've told yourself countless times that he is just another passerby on the road of life. That even if he slips away, you can find innumerable others who are better.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You know that if you chase after him, your life will become as a landship in an endless desert, unable to see your course.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: You don't even know if the decision you made is right or wrong.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: But despite all that, you still turn to your relatives and yell—
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: 'Only he knows that blood is nothing more than blood!'
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wooooah.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oooooh!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So that's the feeling I've been missing this whole time...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yet you already seem to understand it well, young lady.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Let's give it another run-through, Exusiai!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Lemme get a sip of water first—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Haha, ya ain't gettin' away that easy when Sora's in the zone.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'll go fetch some drinks for y'all. And some grub while I'm at it.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Mr. Ben, anything ya'd—
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd he go?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ah, the police are finally here! Over here, ma'am!
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: I'm not the police. I am Lavinia, a municipal judge for Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Siracusa has no police, Signor.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What? No police?
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: Are you a foreigner? In this country, 'they' are the ones responsible for maintaining law and order on the streets.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Who are 'they'? I'm just visiting for some business discussions, so I don't quite understand.
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: Hmph. I'm talking about the mafiosi. You'd best steer clear of them.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I... I know that much.
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: Where's the scene of the crime?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: T-Take a look for yourself... Right there, behind the dumpster.
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: Five people. They couldn't have died more than a day ago. From their outfits, they seem to be from the same famiglia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hold on...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What's wrong, ma'am?
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: I saw them... just this morning.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They attacked a public official earlier. I confronted them about it, but let them go.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But why here of all places... and their leader isn't with them either.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I... I've always heard that Siracusa is a dangerous place.
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: No, if this was a conflict between famiglie, they would've made sure to clean up the scene.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This doesn't make any sense.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For your own safety, act as if you never saw anything.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll handle the rest here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: Damn it, I need to get out of this godforsaken place this instant...
attributes.name: Witness

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia, I didn't expect you to ever call me first.
Demetri, noticed any flamboyant hitmen around town recently?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hmm? Huh... You'd have to either be incredibly brave or incredibly stupid to stick your neck out these days.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...Do you need me to throw last month's crime reports in your face?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I think there's been a little misunderstanding here.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Just now, five bodies were found in a back alley on Viale Orvieto. The scene wasn't cleaned up, which suggests it wasn't the work of one of the famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And just this morning, I saw these same folks attacking a public official.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Huh, now that's new and exciting.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I don't care about the little power struggle between you people, but don't forget that our ironclad rule still stands.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Setting aside recent developments, even in ordinary times the fact still stands that Volsinii is run by Famiglia Bellone, and has a judge as principled as you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Pulling a stunt like this is tantamount to spitting in our faces, and nobody would dare do something like that.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Unless...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Unless they're Columbian. Is that what you wanted to say?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It could be anyone who doesn't give two shits about the rules we've set.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Just keep me posted if you learn anything.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I don't recall having to answer to you, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Is this not also 'tantamount to spitting in the face of Famiglia Bellone'?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Fine then, I'll tell Leon. Maybe he has enough spare time on his hands.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: First, attacks on government officials. Now, hitmen out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Is there really a connection between these?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The humid air creeps inside.
Lavinia's mind races with the details of the latest case as she makes her way back to the courthouse.
She knows full well what looms overhead, but everyone here, including herself, takes it for granted.
At the entrance to the courthouse, Lavinia looks over at her car, and cannot help but let out a sigh.
It has been splashed with paint, and now stands out conspicuously among its neighbors.
A simple gesture of malice.
These acts used to make her feel at a loss for words, but now they trouble her no more than the continuous drizzle.
Of course, there is still the cost of getting the car cleaned.
Sorry.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Be careful out there, signorina.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The rain doesn't seem like it'll let up anytime soon. You might slip if you don't watch your step.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Thanks for the reminder. But you don't seem to have an umbrella either.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm not a fan. I rather enjoy the feeling of raindrops on my skin.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Then I hope you also watch your step.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why are you trying to provoke her?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: And what makes you think that's what I'm doing? Ohh, you think you've got me all figured out now, huh?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I was trying to provoke her, though.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She had a familiar scent on her. One I hate.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Suit yourself. But you're the one who wanted us to break into Famiglia Bellone. And I think this is just making us more suspicious.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I need to know exactly what is happening in this city, and why they wanted to bring Texas back.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So what do you reckon we do? Work our way up from hired guns? Rise through the ranks until we become the Bellones' top hitmen?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Well, Gambino'd probably like the sound of that, at least.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: That's way too inefficient.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You guys need some bargaining chips, isn't that right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So where is Gambino?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Already on his way to the middleman, to cash in the bounty.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hah, look at that. Here in Siracusa, he's a lot better than you at climbing the ranks.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I don't deny that.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: After spending so much time in Lungmen, I'm more shocked at how this place hasn't changed a bit. Not used to it at all anymore.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Trust me, you'll get used to it again soon enough. Just like Gambino.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: After all, you're a Siracusan.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You really gonna let him plant his roots down here again?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Why not? There's nothing stopping you either. Be loud and proud about it. I certainly wouldn't get in your way.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The more I think about it, the less I understand. What exactly are you trying to accomplish?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I'm just enjoying the rainy season. What, do you not like the rain?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: All I know is, Gambino hates the rain.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: So, what news did you get your hands on?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Wanna find out?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Sure, say I do. What would you have me do?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You're in luck. I just happen to be in need of a driver.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Come on in, signor istigatore.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I came back alive, bartender.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Your skills aren't half bad. But neither you, Gambino, nor that friend of yours who left for Lungmen eight years ago, Capone, are good enough.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Don't start talking like you're some hot shit, cub!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You're just like the rumors said. Completely clueless as to when you should and shouldn't press your luck.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Is that not how the last Sicilians lost the favor of Signora Sicilia?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Look at the ones today. What can they do now, except cling to their last pathetic scrap of glory?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Listen up, Gambino. I don't give a shit what you and Capone came back to Siracusa to do, nor do I care who's backing you behind the scenes.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: All I care about is your ability, and the kind of work you can do.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So, what do you think of our work then?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You're not one of us, and you've got guts. Both are good.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So you keep doing good work for me, and I pay you. The better you do, the more you get paid. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You want to see Bellone. Once you've satisfied me, I'll arrange a meeting.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm going to do such a good job that you'll regret it.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You know, I don't hate the fact that you Sicilians ooze ruthlessness from your bones.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That's something Siracusans could use more of these days.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So, let's see you try.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: When the time comes, you'll realize that I never regret a thing.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The banquet is about to begin, and people have been lining up early to wait outside the door.
Welcome, Mr. Beato.
And you are?
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Rubio. We met at the banquet last week.
Ah, I remember now, il Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare. Rubio. I do apologize for this porous mind of mine.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Seeing as you're here, I'm sure tonight's meal is not to be missed.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Hardly, good sir. But as we are expecting some rather esteemed guests tonight, I did put in a little extra effort.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I see, I see.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Over here, Beato.
attributes.name: Snobby Official

attributes.content: I'll be right there. Now, if you'll excuse me.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Who was that?
attributes.name: Snobby Official

attributes.content: Rubio, Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: What? He's actually a government official, looking like that? I ignored him when I first came in because I thought he was just a doorman.
attributes.name: Snobby Official

attributes.content: Not that you're missing out on much. He might as well be a clown.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Why do you say that?
attributes.name: Snobby Official

attributes.content: He's not from one of the famiglie, and after a lifetime of struggling, the best position he could claw himself into was the director of that no-name dipartimento.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: And after he landed the position, he went around kissing the asses of various famiglie until he somehow managed to bumble his way into some renown.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: Nowadays, his dipartimento pretty much caters all events in Volsinii, large and small.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: He doesn't care about his image at all, standing in front of the door to greet the guests like that. I mean, you saw him.
attributes.name: Haughty Official

attributes.content: I see. That said though, there is a thing or two we could learn from his sorry mug.
attributes.name: Snobby Official

attributes.content: I must congratulate you, Rubio.
Oh my... What might the occasion be?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Word on the street is that young master Leontuzzo will be attending the banquet tonight.
The heir to Famiglia Bellone, the great celebrity by Carracci's side, has never attended a banquet like this before.
This is your big break, isn't it?
Haha... Signor Wallach, you must have been quite pleased with the batch of steaks I sent you the other day.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Otherwise, I'm sure you wouldn't be calling me just to joke around in such a manner.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Hahaha.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Things have changed, Rubio. I may be the boss of Famiglia Rossati in this city and made a bit of a name for myself, but there are still plenty of rules I must abide by.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: For example, I have to break the bread of fellowship with a guy like you.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Your support is always appreciated.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: It's good that we all treat each other like family. You scratch my back, I scratch yours. If we have any issues, we settle them on the table.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: None of us enjoy spending all day fighting and killing each other. It's just, a necessity born of circumstance. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Indeed. You work too hard these days, Signor Wallach.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Il Ministero dei Trasporti is headed by a Bellone, and he normally keeps his distance from me. Tch, not much I can do to him.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But il Ministro al Commercio is a smart man, a good friend of mine. Naturally, he enjoys the Rossatis' full support.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: The host of tonight's banquet, Carracci, Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici, is an unpredictable man, though. Even though he's got Bellone's little pup following him around, he manages to stay on decent terms with everyone.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Rubio, food safety is very important, is it not? I do hope you are also a smart man.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Of course, of course.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The VIP arrived just now. Excuse me, I must be off.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I know how strong you are, Signorina Texas. Unfortunately, I am not a man who enjoys resorting to violence.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Using force is the least efficient method.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So if you were expecting to leave Siracusa after making a few heads roll on my behalf, I'm afraid you'll be quite disappointed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Just... tell me what I need to do.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Carracci, Volsinii's Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He is responsible for the construction of the new nomadic city plate. He's also one of our men, and I need you to protect him.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: A government official?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I know what you're going to say.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: 'The government is just the cloth draped over Grey Hall's round table.'
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Every associate of every famiglia remembers Signora Sicilia's lament.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There was once a time when we never took stock of the vases and cutlery sitting on our tablecloth.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But right now, it's something we must pay close attention to.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: When the Columbians brought new things back with them, what disturbed me most was not their technology, but rather...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How they do things nothing like we do in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: They knew that Siracusa's officials were never going to turn their backs on the old guard of the famiglie, so they never required those officials to defer to them in public.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: All they needed was for them to turn a blind eye at just the right moment, or whenever it was convenient for them.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And what can we do? Getting rid of those officials won't solve anything.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Try to settle things with them directly? They're not stupid enough to give the game away.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Despite the not-insignificant amount of power and influence we have here, there is nothing we can do about them.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I believe that you, having spent a number of years living in Lungmen, should be more familiar with their way of doing things.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: ...To the point I almost thought I was back in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hah. But here in Siracusa, few people even realize how big the shockwaves from the Columbian approach might end up being.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You know, Signorina Texas, when I really dove into the nitty-gritty of this approach, to better understand it, the only thing I felt was...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Admiration.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The weapons they deploy are profits and negotiations, not violence and bloodshed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So you also studied their methods.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Studied? No... I'll do it better than them.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And Carracci is my trump card.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Recently, there's been a sudden outbreak of assassinations on government officials around the city. Though I haven't confirmed who's behind the attacks yet, I must ensure the safety of Ministro Carracci.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He's an interesting man, and prefers to walk over taking the car. Even though I have people protecting him in secret, I do not feel at ease.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Now, I've already given them a heads up. Go bring him over to the banquet venue.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: (The target is crossing the street right ahead. There should be at least seven mafiosi covering him from the shadows.)
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: (Seems like there won't be any major issues...)
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Would you look at that. Didn't I just say something good was about to happen?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas, care for some mille-feuille?
attributes.name: Lappland
